name: typebox-validators
author: Joseph T. Lapp <arachnojoe@gmail.com>
description: TypeBox validators with lazy compilation, custom error messages, safe error handling, discriminated and heterogeneous unions

scripts.build: rm -rdf dist && tsc && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE dist
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-docs
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-chrome
scripts.build-and-publish: npm run build && (cd dist && npm publish)
